value.description: The value of the accordion item.

disabled.description: Whether the accordion item is disabled.

focusChange.description: The callback fired when the focused accordion item changes.

update:modelValue.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.

valueChange.description: The callback fired when the state of expanded/collapsed accordion items changes.

collapsible.description: Whether an accordion item can be after it has been expanded.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the accordion that are expanded.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the accordion.

disabled.description: Whether the accordion items are disabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.

modelValue.description:
The accordion items that are currently expanded.
Use this prop to control the state of the items via v-model.

multiple.description: Whether multple accordion items can be expanded at the same time.

orientation.description: The orientation of the accordion items.
